trans-unit.source: Represents a single [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
Adds the specified [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.

The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Task" name="Task" href=""></xref> element to add to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""></xref> element.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object represents a child `Task` element of the `Target` element.
Gets the `Condition` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The `Condition` attribute value of the `Target` element.
Gets the `DependsOnTargets` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element, which is a semicolon-separated list.
The `DependsOnTargets` attribute value of the `Target` element.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child element of the `Target` element.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref>.
Gets or sets the items that are to be input into this target.
Items inside this target attribute are used as the inputs in the top level dependency analysis.
A string representing the items.
Gets a value indicating whether the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element was imported into the project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Target` element was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the `Name` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The `Name` attribute value of the `Target` element.
Gets or sets the expected outputs of this target.
You can apply transforms to this target attribute to transform a set of input items into a set of output items.
This attribute is used not only for top level dependency analysis but also for the purposes of defining this targets outputs.
A string representing the outputs.
Removes the specified [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element from the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child `Task` element of the `Target` element.

The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Task" name="Task" href=""></xref> element to remove from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""></xref> element.
